abstract: A hacker group has released what it says is a one-click way to install unauthorized third-party applications on an iPhone or iPod Touch. You still can’t switch the iPhone to another wireless carrier.
snippet: A hacker group has released what it says is a one-click way to install unauthorized third-party applications on an iPhone or iPod Touch. You still can’t switch the iPhone to another wireless carrier.
lead_paragraph: Just a quick update on the saga of the hackers versus Apple.
